item.description:
Join Laura of Elsie Designs on Wednesday, November 10th from 6:30-8:30pm to bring a bit more glam to your life. Elsieâ€™s accessories are for all ages and lots of fun to wear.Laura will also be sharing fun tips and tricks for ribbon embellishments.

Kolleen Burbank, a wire jewelry artist, will also be joining us. Kolleen began beading in her hometown in Connecticut. Her favorite pieces use wire-wrapping to put a twist on classic styles. Kolleen has always enjoyed experimenting with different chains. More recently, she has incorporated wire-wrapped beads into chain pieces to strike a good balance between delicate and casual jewelry.

*beverages will be served.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Artist Trunk Show: Elsie Design's Accessories & Kolleen Burbank, Wire Jewelry
